oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photomontage of Civil War veterans, kindergarteners, aviators and an airplane, an antique car, an opera star, and medals. Nashville Banner, 1926 August 8.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Moore, Lucy Holt; Mackenzie, Johnny; Hartsfield; Douglas; MacFarland; MacNevin, Donald
Nashville Banner
Veterans; Children; Airplanes; Air pilots; Automobiles; Singers; Medals
Nashville (Tenn.)--History--Sources; Nashville (Tenn.)--Social life and customs; Nashville and Davidson County (Tenn.)--History--Sources
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Photomontage of Civil War veterans convening in Carthage, Wesley House kindergarten graduates, aviators in front of an airplane (one of whom died that week in a plane crash), an antique car in Shelbyville, a visiting opera star, and medals won by a local marksman. 16 x 21.5 in. Forms part of the Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Thuss, W. G.; Seat, Waldo; Barr, W. E.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:publisher: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:relation: Nashville Newspaper Rotogravure Digital Images Collection.
